text: Ep 2000 is the second EP by Quebec hard rock group GrimSkunk released in 2000. Tracks 1 and 4 would later appear on the album Seventh Wave. == Track listing == #Check-moé ben aller (Bring Me Down) #Misfit #Right On (Rock 'n' Roll Dream) #My Girlfriend == References == Bande à part profile Category:GrimSkunk albums Category:2000 EPs Category:Indica Records albums
title: EP 2000
